channel.title: Oliver Sacks on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Oliver Sacks on Strat

item.title: The Man Who Mistook His Wife For A Hat
item.description: The Man Who Mistook His Wife for a Hat tells the stories of individuals afflicted with perceptual and intellectual disorders: patients who have lost their memories and with them the greater part of their pasts; who are no longer able to recognize people and common objects; whose limbs seem alien to them; who lack some skills yet are gifted with uncanny artistic or mathematical talents.
